information: COUFIDOU is a cooperative representing 65 producers. It transforms and sells conventional and organic Agen prunes in all its forms. Located in the heart of the Périgord, every year we process 3000 tones of prunes, half of which is exported. We have 5 product ranges, all with different destinations. COUFIDOU is aimed at supermarket distribution, wholesalers and retailers.
